mapper.select: select al.topic_id from ( select (max(topic_id)+1) as topic_id from publish_content ) al

select u.id ,u.topic_id ,u.username ,u.title ,u.content ,u.time ,p.comment_content_id ,p.comment_username ,p.comment_content ,p.comment_time
from publish_content u left join publish_comment p on u.id = p.comment_content_id where u.username=#{0} and topic_id = #{1} order by coalesce(p.comment_time ,u.time) desc

select u.id ,u.topic_id ,u.username ,u.title ,u.content ,u.time
,u.agree_content_num ,u.disagree_content_num
,p.comment_id ,p.comment_content_id ,p.comment_username ,p.comment_content ,p.comment_time
,p.agree_comment_num ,p.disagree_comment_num
from ( select content.* ,assess_content.agree_content_num ,assess_content.disagree_content_num
from publish_content content
left join (select assess_id ,sum(if(is_agree='1' ,1 ,0)) as agree_content_num ,sum(if(is_agree='0' ,1 ,0)) as disagree_content_num
from publish_assess where is_comment = '0' group by assess_id ) assess_content on content.id = assess_content.assess_id
)u
left join ( select comment.* ,comment.id as comment_id ,assess_comment.agree_comment_num ,assess_comment.disagree_comment_num
from publish_comment comment left join (select assess_id ,sum(if(is_agree='1' ,1 ,0)) as agree_comment_num ,sum(if(is_agree='0' ,1 ,0)) as disagree_comment_num
from publish_assess where is_comment = '1' group by assess_id ) assess_comment on comment.id = assess_comment.assess_id
) p on u.id = p.comment_content_id where topic_id = 1 order by coalesce(p.comment_time ,u.time) desc limit 10
